Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1972...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 6/12/1972 (Going to STL: P M. Proly. Going to CLE: LF J. Kennedy, 3B M. Trillo)...
Injured on 8/24/1975 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1976...
Injured on 4/27/1976 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/14/1980 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1981, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Injured on 5/15/1982 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1982, going 3-0, 0.86...
